name: Game Modifier: Lair of Bones
desc:
A 1v4 game mode set in the basement, where Bones hunts down four victims before the time runs out.
For the latest news on our modes, follow @TCMModes on X and join our Discord server.

name: Gamemode Sypnosis
desc: Trapped in the basement, you're either hunting or being hunted. There is no escape—only survival. Victims must stay alive for 7 minutes, while Bones must eliminate them all before time runs out.

name: Quick Starting Guide
desc:
Bones: Once you spawn in, immediately jump down the nearest well to reach the Victims hiding in the basement.

Victims: Scatter throughout the basement to find useful items while avoiding Bones.

name: Victims are a few hits away from death, and their stamina regenerates more slowly.
desc:
Running alone won’t save you from Bones. Be prepared—have a backup plan in case things go south.
Victims can find helpful items throughout the basement to track, blind or stun Bones.

name: Victims need to survive for 7 minutes.
desc: If any victims are still alive when time runs out, they win and receive a 'Victim Escaped' notification.

name: Grandpa’s Sonar Behavior
desc: At the start of the match, Grandpa’s sonar only highlights moving victims. Once two victims are executed, it will reveal all victims, whether they are moving or not.

name: Character's Abilities
desc: Every character comes with a unique ability and a few extra perks to help them out.

name: Additional perks and extra attribute points are disabled.
desc:
- You only need to unlock the first ability (Level 1) in a character's skill tree to gain access to everything they can do.
- You can also equip the base perks for Victims and Family for additional abilities.

name: Bones
desc:
Bones places bombs quickly and can carry up to 3 at once. Bombs don’t deal damage, but any victim caught is revealed to him for 30 seconds. Bombs have a shorter explosion delay. He also moves faster overall, has all traversal perks unlocked, and is quicker through crawl spaces, gaps, and barricades.
Bones' proximity aura is smaller.

name: Leland
desc: Leland can barge Bones once per match with a long stun. He can also open crawl spaces instantly with one tap when near Bones.

name: Connie
desc: Connie can craft wrenches by collecting an unlock tool from a toolbox and swapping it with another item in the environment. She can see the aura of a fuse in the basement that can be used to swap unlock tools for crafting wrenches. She also doesn’t trigger bone chimes.

name: Sonny
desc: Sonny can activate his Sense ability for 10 seconds, with a 25-second cooldown. While active, he gains a 30% speed boost, his detection range is significantly increased, and he can tell whether a noise was made by a victim or Bones.

name: Ana
desc: Ana can activate her ability for 5 seconds, during which she takes no damage and regenerates stamina. It has a 60-second cooldown. Additionally, any doors latched by her are harder to barge.

name: Julie
desc: Julie can activate her ability to prevent stamina from draining for 25 seconds, followed by a 70-second cooldown. She also doesn't trigger bone chimes or alert chickens.

name: Wyatt
desc: Wyatt starts with 4 knives, which he can instantly aim and throw. Hitting Bones reveals him to all victims for 20 seconds, and to Wyatt for 50 seconds.

name: Unavailable Victims: Danny, Virginia and Maria (DO NOT USE)
desc: Due to bug-related conflicts, Danny, Virginia, and Maria are not available in this mode. Please do not equip them, as they have no abilities and may cause issues.

name: Bones' perks:
desc:
The following perks are available for Bones.
Selecting these existing perks in the game will now grant new effects, detailed below.

If you want this perk -> Equip this one in game

name: Spring Clean
desc: Before Grandpa activates, your stamina consumption is reduced by 100%.

name: Wired
desc: Victims climbing over obstacles are highlighted to you for 10 seconds.

name: Hurt Pride
desc: After recovering from being stunned, your stamina recharges 100% faster for 30 seconds.

name: Universal Abilities (All Victims):
desc:
- After being injured, you are able to recover 15 health by avoiding damage for the next 45 seconds.
- If Bones comes within 4 meters of a hiding victim, he will be revealed and highlighted for all Victims to see.
- The stun range when bursting out of hiding spots has been slightly increased.
- Only Leland can open crawl spaces when Bones is nearby; other victims cannot.

name: Universal Perks (All Victims):
desc:
The following perks are available for all victims.
Selecting these existing perks in the game will now grant new effects, detailed below.

If you want this perk -> Equip this one in game

name: SOS
desc:
Your aura will be revealed to all Victims when at least one of these conditions are met:
- The first 3 minutes of the match
- When you are below 60% health

name: No Sell
desc: Getting hit by Bones results in 50% less damage. Has 1 charge.

name: Cover Recovery
desc: Stamina recovery increased by 120% while using hiding spots or shadows.

name: Radar Detector
desc: While Grandpa's Sonar ability is activated, Bones will be highlighted for 5 seconds. Has 5 charges.

name: Additional notes:
desc: Picking up bone shards isn’t intended in this mode, so grappling Bones is ineffective.
